track.name: Algorithms
track.descriptions: The true test of problem solving: when one realizes that time and memory aren't infinite.

primary_contest.description: Join OpenBracket CodeSprint beginning October 15th to solve challenges, win 50,000 USD in cash prizes and prove your skills to companies hiring like Microsoft, JPMorgan Chase, Capital One and more! This is a 48 hour competition. First place wins $10,000 and 50 winners win a round trip ticket to Delaware to compete for an onsite competition.
primary_contest.name: OpenBracket CodeSprint

model.preview: How many people will know about the new product after n days?
